sch:assert.test: not(h:Site/h:SiteType) or count(h:Site/h:SiteType[text()='urban' or text()='suburban' or text()='rural']) = 1

sch:rule.sch:assert: Air leakage must be provided in one of three ways: (a) nACH (natural air changes per hour), (b) ACH50 (air changes per hour at 50Pa), or (c) CFM50 (cubic feet per minute at 50Pa)
the number of element 'Walls/Wall' MUST be greater than or equal to 1
Both 'BeginMonth' and 'BeginDayOfMonth' must be either blank or provided
Both 'EndMonth' and 'EndDayOfMonth' must be either blank or provided
either element 'ConditionedBuildingVolume' or element 'AverageCeilingHeight' must be provided

count(h:CoolingSystemType[text()='central air conditioner' or text()='room air conditioner' or text()='evaporative cooler']) = 1

element 'HeatPumpType[text()='air-to-air' or text()='mini-split' or text()='ground-to-air']' is REQUIRED

sch:rule.sch:assert: both element 'DuctSurfaceArea' and 'DuctLocation' MUST be either blank or provided
